content:
This zulip server is now backed up at https://github.com/bytecodealliance/zulip-archive and hosted as a website at https://bytecodealliance.github.io/zulip-archive/

This means that the conversations will be publicly available on search engines (when they index it) making them more accessible to users. AI will also be able to scrape and use this data.

GitHub - bytecodealliance/zulip-archive: A static html archive of Bytecode Alliance Zulip
A static html archive of Bytecode Alliance Zulip. Contribute to bytecodealliance/zulip-archive development by creating an account on GitHub.
This zulip has had basically all streams marked as web-public for years anyway.
